name: Universal Controls LLC
title: Programmer
accomplishments: Programming logic controllers (PLCs), single board computers (e.g. Raspberry Pi), and human-machine interfaces. Set up VPS as a Certificate Authority for securing/encrypting internet traffic, web services using HTTPS.

name: Design Center Colorado
title: Junior Systems Engineer Contract
accomplishments: On interdisciplinary team of nine engineers, client was Siemens Gamesa Renewable Energy who invested over $15,000 towards the project's completion.

Interfaced single board computer with three sensor modules (GPS, IMU, LIDAR) and an IR camera, installed/configured OS, developed program/service used to test sensors, buffer/log data, monitor system, and communicate with operator.

name: West Safety Services

name: University of Colorado Boulder

Helped resolve networking issues such as physical connectivity, OS configuration and VPN security requirements.

name: Arizona State University
title: Support Systems Specialist
accomplishments: Provided Tier 2 IT support for the Global Institute of Sustainability (GIOS).  Responsible for designing/deploying computer images, managing user accounts and network file share permissions, and administrating Active Directory and Group policy.
Resolved hardware, software, network, printer and smart-phone issues via phone, e-mail and in person.
Successfully upgraded GIOS computers (100+ machines) from Windows XP/Office 2003 to Windows 7/Office 2010.
Recommended and created quotes for new equipment based on user’s needs and requests.
Worked with 3rd party vendors for warranty replacements.

name: Blue Ridge High School

Resolved hardware, software, networking and printer issues via phone, email, remotely and in person.
